question: I was recently diagnosed with severe axial neuropathy of lower limbs ( motor and snsor ).I do not have any pain or numbness, the neuropathy  discovered  after I was diagnosed with nerurpoathic ulcer under my right toe.  I'm  normaly healthy 36 years old man  with no diabetes or vitamin b12 deficiency. 8 month ago I had vertical sleeve gastrectomy and I have lost about 100 pounds. I would like to know what  are the reasons for this kind of neuropathy, what is the treatmet?THANK YOU
title: severe axial neuropathy of lower limbs
